trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Plainfield
There were no other sightings in Plainfield on or around October 9th 2007
divs: Sighting Detailsthe craft was observed on an overcast night approximately 100 to 200 yards above the ground, below the cloud cover but well above the trees. It was cruising slowy over a populated area. We were in a car stopped at train tracks waiting for a long train to pass. The craft had several blue lights along the "pointed end" (which appeared to be the rear) of the teardrop shape. It dissapeared beyond the buildings after approximately 5 seconds. It was travelling in a South to North direction.
Summary: low flying craft with blue lights
